name: WPCafe Restaurant Addon for Oxygen Builder
author: Themewinter

sections.description:
WPCafe Oxygen Builder Addons enables the WPCafe Food Menu and Restaurant Reservation plugin to parse WPCafe widgets inside the Oxygen editor for Pages.

WPCafe Oxygen Builder addons provide free Oxygen Builder elements for creating cafe and restaurant websites. If you can use Oxygen builder then you are ready to use WPCafe Oxygen addons for your food ordering business websites.

To use this plugin, you must first have all the plugins installed and activated. The required plugins are:
1. Oxygen
2. WPCafe
3. WooCommerce
4. WPCafe Oxygen Addon
5. Oxygen Elements for WooCommerce

Check WPCafe PRO || Support || Documentation

Features of WPCafe Oxygen Addons

Food Menu– You can use food menu elements on oxygen builder addons. List style food menu, tab style food menu and location-based food menu elements available. With the food menu elements, you can add an appealing food menu on your Oxygen website.

Restaurant Reservation– Reservation elements will enable you to add a reservation form at your Oxygen site. With the form of reservation, you can take the user’s reservation from the website directly.

üëçUse WPCafe Oxygen Builder Addons to build a complete Restaurant Solution website and run your online üî•Restaurant Business, üî•Online Food Order, üî•Reservation System, Pickup, üî•Delivery and More.

If you use WPCafe PRO with Oxygen builder on your website, you will get more premium features to build cafe websites, restaurant websites and so on. WPCafe PRO will unlock all the RPO elements of the food menu, reservation, delivery and whatnot.

About WPCafe

WPCafe is a complete WooCommerce food ordering, pickup and delivery plugin to launch restaurant websites. You can create a food menu, restaurant reservation, food ordering and delivery system (PRO). Moreover, WPCafe comes with WordPress shortcode, Elementor widgets and Gutenberg block to make your Restaurant website simple and easy to use.

WPCafe Parent Plugin Feature List For Food Menu:

‚≠ê 30+ Food Style and Templates
‚≠ê Discount Offer Option
‚≠ê Location Based Food Menu
‚≠ê Customizable Ajax Mini Cart
‚≠ê WooCommerce invoice print and PDF download
‚≠ê Option to Design Color, Icon on Mini-Cart

WPCafe Parent Plugins Other Features:

‚≠ê Food Delivery and Pickup time
‚≠ê Location selection popup for homepage
‚≠ê Customize Order Delivery and Pickup Form
‚≠ê Pickup and Delivery Schedule
‚≠ê Order Prepare and Delivery Schedule
‚≠ê Holiday and Special Day Schedule
‚≠ê Fully Customizable Reservation Form
‚≠ê Single and Multiple Slot Schedule Booking
‚≠ê Seat Capacity Management
‚≠ê RTL Support Form and Calendar
‚≠ê Early Booking and Late Booking
‚≠ê Customizable Email Body for Reservations
‚≠ê Frontend Reservation Cancellation
‚≠ê Cancel a reservation from front-end
sections.faq:
Should I install WPCafe and Oxygen Builder Plugin for the addons?

YES! The addons work with WPCafe and Oxygen Builder. To get full functionality, you will need to install both of the plugins.

What are you offering with this addons plugin?

We are offering options for the food menus, reservations for WPCafe.
sections.changelog:
1.1.2 ( November 27, 2023 )

New : Reservation with Food – Tab Elements Added
Tweak : WordPress & Oxygen builder latest Version Compatibility check
Fix : WordPress 6.4 compatibility

1.1.1 ( January 10, 2023 )

New : Location Filter Widgets Added
Tweak : WordPress & Oxygen builder latest Version Compatibility check
Tweak : PHP,JS script optimization

1.1.0 ( December 14, 2021 )

New : New oxygen builder widgets compatible with WPCafe Pro
Fix : General bug fix

1.0.0 ( December 04, 2021 )

Initial Release
